MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area this evening and we apologies for this. Our engineers are still on site at the West Sanquhar Road substation investigating an underground cable fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:37pm on Monday, 15 March 2021
